BLL

Class TaskListEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • BLL.TaskListEvent

  • public class TaskListEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    MediaItem TaskList update event argument object passed with details of the event

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DELETE_ALL_CONTENTS_TASKS

      Provides the action to taken with this event

    • Field Detail

      • NEW

        public static final int NEW
        See Also:

      • DELETE_ALL_CONTENTS_TASKS

        public static final int DELETE_ALL_CONTENTS_TASKS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskListEvent

        public TaskListEvent(TaskItem taskItem,
             MediaItem mediaItem,
             int action)
        Sets the event parameters at creation
        Parameters:
        taskItem - TaskItem to be added to the TaskList or null if action = DELETE_ALL_CONTENTS_TASKS
        mediaItem - MediaItem for which all items are to be removed from the TaskList or null if action = NEW
        action - Action to be taken by this event as set by the constants NEW or DELETE_ALL_CONTENTS_TASKS

    • Method Detail

      • getTaskItem

        public TaskItem getTaskItem()
        Provides the TaskItem passed with this event
        Returns:
        the taskItem

      • getAction

        public int getAction()
        Provides the action to taken with this event
        Returns:
        the action

      • getMediaItem

        public MediaItem getMediaItem()
        Provides the mediaItem that the DELETE_ALL_CONTENTS_TASKS constant refers to
        Returns:
        the mediaItem The item for which all its tasks are to be deleted
